ygData.subject: Re: [[EQ_women] Re: Digest Number 166]
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, my son turned 13 and I promised he could play EQ.  I got Anarchy Online as well, because I was so sick of EQ when I quit, but he wanted me to play with
ygData.messageBody:
Well, my son turned 13 and I promised he could play EQ. I got Anarchy Online
as well, because I was so sick of EQ when I quit, but he wanted me to play
with him and being at that "awkward adolescent" age where mothers and sons
have a hard enough time finding things to talk about, seemed like I should.

So I started my HE enchanter (never played enchanter past 7 and he wanted to
play Wood Elf Warrior) and eep, I got hooked all over again!!!! She's 4 now
and I was having a blast mes'ing cents, pulling pawns, and letting my pet kill
while I meditated *hurry up 35 so I can dump the stupid book*.

Now I have to find all the EQ sites all over again because I threw absolutely
everything away. Oh, but after 9 mos. of not playing, my level 54 druid was
still alive and well and virtually naked (on Brell) as I gave almost all her
good stuff away before quitting. Oh, yeah, we're playing on Xev. My son had
a friend in his Scout troup that plays there. Know nothing about it yet other
than GFay is still a spam zone.

Anyway, played until 1 AM last night and beat myself up for it this morning,
but wasn't too sleepy and got my workout in and got to work on time so all's
well I hope.

Oh, if anyone can figure out AO, it looks cool, but I don't really understand
the game yet. Looking for web sites there as well.

Iceiallana now Iceafara :-)


this email group is alive after all. :-)

my fiance and I both play on Veeshan.
I started out playing a druid on the Rathe, in July got her to about
level 11, and then decided that wasn't the profession for me. We had
heard some good things about Veeshan, so we made the switch!
Having a wonderful time. Have met some very wonderful people, and had
the good fortune to join a guild, the Honorable Knights.

He has a level 6 Barbarian Shaman called Tavvish, and my character is
a Level 7 (so close to 8 it is painful) High Elf Enchantress named
Nyndari.

Send a tell and say hi if you are on! *smile*

We are currently in misty thicket, doing some adventuring. I managed
to save a young halfling druid's life, and it turned out that it was
his alt, and he had a high level enchanter on hold, so I received a
rod of insidious glamour as a reward, I nearly died!

p.s Enchanters Rock!!
p.p.s I am not addicted, I can stop playing anytime I want to,....
um.. I just don't want to! *LOL*
Someone mentioned they didn't know how to get to the website? this is
the address: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EQ_women/
Cheers
Bec


--- In EQ_women@y..., zen7598610@a... wrote:
> Is anyone else here on Veeshan? I play a 53 level Enchanter, and I
have been
> playing about a year and a half. I also have 2 warriors levels 30
and 40. My
> husband is a MAJOR addict! I love it, but not nearly as addicted as
he is!
> You know.. women just cant stop everything to play : )
>
> Joyce
> aka Galadriana Dimystic level 53 enchantress
> Seka O'Lushious level 30 warrior
> Torma TuBois level 40 warrior
>
> *redheads kick A**!!!!
